issue.title: www.perplexity.ai

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.perplexity.ai/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.perplexity.ai%2F) ### Comment > After making a couple of inquiries, a mask appears over the results and forces a sign-in. > If the mask could be blocked, it would be appreciated. > Thank you. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/hp66sk9gy7cowwgsgwck48ow4gcg4os7v2gch5svvs.jpg?nc=1)
